main_definition: Shall is a modal verb used to indicate future actions, obligations, or intentions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used for formal expressions of will or intention in the future
meanings_and_examples.example: I shall attend the meeting tomorrow.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicating a strong determination to do something
meanings_and_examples.example: The team shall overcome this challenge together.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in legal or official documents to express an obligation
meanings_and_examples.example: You are hereby obliged to pay the fines within 30 days as per the law, you shall comply with the terms of your employment contract.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Expressing a promise or threat in informal language
meanings_and_examples.example: If you don't finish your homework on time, I will ground you!
